testcase.name: Verify whether User is able to access - VMS Application MSP User
Create and Submit Candidate as Vendor
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Supplier to which job was distributed........................passed Then In the user's dashboard, from "Pending Actions" widgets click on "New Job Requests".passed Then This will open Jobs needing submittal..................................passed Then Click on the job you created; this will redirect you to "Job Details" Section.passed Then Click on the actions button on the top right corner and select.........passed And add & submit candidate to create and submit candidate...................passed And Submit candidate to select candidates from the list of available candidates.passed Then Fill in the necessary details and click on submit candidate............passed
